entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this evening then changing to rain before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
